resources.string:
More updates are coming soon including scheduling a different bedtime for each day of the week and the ability to adjust motion sensitivity.
 
 v1.1.3
 - Fixed bug that caused the alarm to go off 5 minutes early - Fixed bug where vibrate would not always work when selected - Fixed a bug with auto-snooze motion detection on some devices (including Galaxy Nexus) - Updated notification messages to indicate why alarm was automatically snoozed. - Added this change log
 - Updated the Spanish translation using Google Translate Toolkit. Please let me know if the translation is poor.
 
 v1.1.2
 - Fixed a bug where some phones would list Unknown for Alarm Tone instead of just using the default
 - Updated feedback email in menu
 - Removed German due to poor translation
 v1.1.1
 - Fixed compatibility with Galaxy Nexus.
 - Updated developer name to Dr Poindexter
Sounds after bedtime only if phone is not charging and is motionless for 5 to 10 minutes
Click notification to dismiss alarm for tonight
There are no email clients installed.
Charge reminder soon. Click to cancel.
Phone unplugged but still needs charged. Click to cancel.
Ringer volume is set to zero, press volume keys to adjust.

Have you ever forgotten to plug in your phone at night to find your phone's battery dead the next day? If so, then Always Charged is for you. Just set the time to your regular bedtime, and if you remember to plug in your phone, nothing will happen. However, if you forget, an alarm will sound, reminding you to charge your phone.


This is not just a simple alarm. It waits patiently and silently snoozes the alarm if you are using your phone, moving around, or already have it plugged in and charging.


If you like or dislike something about this application, or you want to suggest a feature, please send me an email (press the menu button from the main screen).
